ygData.subject: DarkForge Armor Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok I ve seen screen shots of this armor in the past and noticed that it was No Drop. I recently saw a picture of the Helm and noticed that it was not No Drop.
ygData.messageBody:
Ok I've seen screen shots of this armor in the past and noticed that it was
No Drop. I recently saw a picture of the Helm and noticed that it was not No
Drop. So is it just this piece that doesn't have the No Drop restriction or
have they removed it from all pieces?

My personal opinion is that I would want all the pieces No Drop, that way we
don't have other classes harvesting the armor and also it's kind of like a
status symbol (You had to do the quest to get it). Of course as of yet I
haven't got any of the new armor (the whole camping Cazic thing doesn't have
me too excited)..

Enjoy...

Thom
